content: In that amazing "zugzwang", the player had all his pieces and pawns on the board and was not under any direct threat, but had only suicidal moves available, which led him to lose the game.
translations: ita:In quel fantastico zugzwang, il giocatore aveva tutti i suoi pezzi e pedoni sulla scacchiera e non era sotto alcuna mina
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
